name: Barbarian
description: Barbarian is a character Class in Baldur's Gate 3. Barbarians use their martial prowess and primal rage to strengthen themselves and dominate enemies in combat. Barbarians' key ability scores are Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution.

action.name: Rage
action.summary:
Rage is a Barbarian Bonus Action and Class Feature. Enter a Rage to gain Resistance against physical damage, deal extra melee and thrown damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws. Wearing Heavy Armour triggers the Rage Impeded Condition, removing most benefits of Rage.

This page is for the Barbarian action. For the Beast Master companion action see {{SAI|Rage (Boar).}}
action.description:
Available only in combat.

While Raging, you are stronger, and you deal 2 extra damage with melee and improvised weapons, and when throwing objects.

You have Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Rage ends early if you don't attack an enemy or take damage each turn.

You can't cast or concentrate on spells while raging.

grants.name: Unarmoured Defence (Barbarian)
grants.description: Your body is as resilient as any armour. While not wearing Constitution Modifier to your ArmourClass. Wearing Heavy Armour impedes your Rage.

action.name: Reckless Attack
action.summary: Reckless Attack is a Barbarian class action that grants them Advantage on attacks but also granting enemies Advantage on attacks against them.
action.description:
Throw all caution in the wind to gain Advantage on your melee Attack Roll.

Until your next turn, you have Advantage on all Attack Rolls, but enemies also have Advantage on Attack Rolls against you.

grants.name: Danger Sense
grants.description:
You sense when things aren't as they should be. 

You have Advantage on Dexterity surfaces. 

To gain this benefit, you can't be Blinded or Incapacitated.

options.name: Berserker
options.description: Violence is both a means and an end. You follow a path of untrammeled fury, slick with blood, as you thrill in the chaos of battle, heedless of your own well-being.

action.name: Frenzy
action.summary: Frenzy is a Berserker Bonus Action that is a superset of Rage. This ability turns the Berserker's anger into an uncontrollable fury and grants additional abilities in addition to those from Rage. Wearing Heavy Armour triggers the Rage Impeded Condition, removing some benefits of Frenzy.
action.description:
Available only in combat.

Your Rage turns into a frenzy! You gain Frenzied Strike and Enraged Throw. You can also make an Improvised Melee Weapon (Bonus Action)|Improvised Melee Weapon as a bonus action.

You have Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Rage ends early if you don't attack an enemy or take damage each turn.

You can't cast or concentrate on spells while raging.

action.name: Frenzied Strike
action.summary:
Frenzied Strike is a Berserker Bonus Action. This ability allows the Berserker to make a melee attack as a bonus action once per turn.

Looking for the Barbarian bonus action? See {{SAI|Rage.}}
action.description:
As a bonus action, make a melee attack with your equipped weapon.

* Will cause a stack of Frenzied Strain on the barbarian.
* Available only when Frenzied.

action.name: Enraged Throw
action.summary: Enraged Throw is a Berserker Bonus Action. This ability allows the Berserker to make a ranged attack using nearby items or creatures.
action.description:
Pick up an item or creature and throw it at a target, dealing additional damage and knocking it Prone.

Your Strength affects the additional damage and how much weight you can throw. Heavier items deal more damage.

The damage of weapons with the thrown property is the same as the weapon's melee damage.

Available only when Frenzied.

options.name: Wild Magic
options.description: The wild influence of magic has transformed you, suffusing you with arcane power that churns within you, waiting to be released.

action.name: Rage: Wild Magic
action.summary: Rage: Wild Magic is a Wild Magic Barbarian Bonus Action. When you Rage, it causes a random magical effect to happen.
action.description: Enter a Rage to gain resistance against physical damage and deal extra melee damage. Barbarians gain Rage at level 1.

action.name: Magic Awareness
action.summary: Magic Awareness is a Wild Magic Barbarian Bonus Action. This ability gives bonuses to Saving Throws against spells.
action.description: Anyone within range adds their Proficiency Bonus to Saving Throws against spells.

options.name: Wildheart
options.description: Your attunement with nature and its beasts inspires your rage, empowering you with supernatural might.

action.name: Speak with Animals
action.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to understand and talk to beasts and animals for a day.
action.description: Gain the ability to comprehend and communicate with beasts.
action.notes:
* Wildhearts can cast this spell once per Long Rest.
* Forest Gnomes can cast this spell once per Long Rest.
* Also granted to Warlocks who choose the Eldritch Invocation Beast Speech at level 2+.

action.name: Rage: Bear Heart
action.summary:
Rage: Bear Heart  is a Wildheart Bonus Action. This ability allows them to use their bear-like anger to gain resistance against all types of damage (except psychic) and deal extra melee damage to enemies.

This page is for the Barbarian action. For the Beast Master companion action see {{SAI|Rage (Boar).}}
action.description:
Go into a Rage that makes you tough enough to stand up to any punishment.

You can use Unrelenting Ferocity, and have Resistance to all damage types except psychic damage.

Rage ends early if you haven't attacked a creature or taken damage since your last turn.

action.name: Unrelenting Ferocity
action.summary: Unrelenting Ferocity is an action available to Wildheart Barbarians with the Rage: Bear Heart bestial heart. This ability allows them to heal themselves while raging.
action.description:
Muster up your stamina to heal yourself.

Can only be used once per Rage.

action.name: Rage: Eagle Heart
action.summary: Rage: Eagle Heart is a Wildheart Bonus Action. This ability allows them to use their eagle-like anger to become hard to hit and gain the ability to attack enemies from the sky.
action.description:
Go into a Rage that makes you near untouchable. You can use Diving Strike.

Foes also have Disadvantage on Opportunity Attacks against you, and you can use Dash Bonus Action|Dash as a bonus action.

Rage ends early if you haven't attacked a creature or taken damage since your last turn.

action.name: Rage: Elk Heart
action.summary: Rage: Elk  Heart is a Wildheart Bonus Action. This ability allows them to use their elk-like anger to increase their movement speed.
action.description:
Go into a Rage that grants you extraordinary swiftness.

You can use Primal Stampede, and your Movement Speed increases by m=4.5|ft=15.

Rage ends early if you haven't attacked a creature or taken damage since your last turn.

action.name: Rage: Tiger Heart
action.summary: Rage: Tiger  Heart is a Wildheart Bonus Action. This ability allows them to use their tiger-like anger to increase their jump distance.
action.description:
Go into a Rage that empowers your leaps.

You can use Tiger's Bloodlust, and your jump distance increases by m=4.5|ft=15.

Rage ends early if you haven't attacked a creature or taken damage since your last turn.

action.name: Rage: Wolf Heart
action.summary: Rage: Wolf Heart is a Wildheart Bonus Action. This ability allows them to use their wolf-like anger to aid their allies in combat.
action.description:
Go into a Rage so inciting it spurs on your allies.

You can use Inciting Howl, and each ally within earshot can move an additional 3m / 10ft during their next turn.

Rage ends early if you haven't attacked a creature or taken damage since your last turn.

action.name: Inciting Howl
action.summary:
Inciting Howl is an action available to Wildhearts with the Rage: Wolf Heart bestial heart. This ability allows them to use their wolf-like anger to increase their allies' movement speed.

This page is for the Barbarian action. For the Beast Master companion action see {{SAI|Rage (Boar).}}
action.description: Each ally within earshot can move an additional 3 m / 10 ft during their next turn.

options.name: Ability Improvement
options.description:
Note: While technically not a Feat, Ability Improvement is offered within the Feat Selection menu.
* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

grants.name: Ability Improvement
grants.description:
Note: While technically not a Feat, Ability Improvement is offered within the Feat Selection menu.
* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

options.name: Actor
options.description:
* Your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance checks. 
* Note: despite not mentioning this in the tooltip, the character also gains proficiency in these 2 skills if they didn't have those proficiencies yet (game version: 4.36.34458).

grants.name: Actor
grants.description:
* Your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance checks. 
* Note: despite not mentioning this in the tooltip, the character also gains proficiency in these 2 skills if they didn't have those proficiencies yet (game version: 4.36.34458).

options.name: Alert
options.description:
Alert|w=30
:* You gain a +5 bonus to Surprised.

grants.name: Alert
grants.description: You gain +5 to Initiative and can no longer be surprised.

options.name: Athlete
options.description:
Athlete: Standing Up|w=30
:* Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump (Bonus Action)|Jump distance also increases by 50%.

grants.name: Athlete: Standing Up
grants.description: When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump (Bonus Action)|Jump distance also increases by 50%.

options.name: Charger
options.description:
Gain the following weapon attacks:

Charger: Weapon Attack|w=30
:* Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
:* Notes:
:** Use both an action and bonus action, move up to 9m, and make a melee attack with +5 damage.
:** This counts as a single weapon attack, not a full Action, so it is possible to follow up with abilities like Extra Attack.

Charger: Shove|w=30
:* Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way.
:* Notes:
:** Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.
:** This counts as a full Action.

grants.name: Charger
grants.description:
Gain the following weapon attacks:

Charger: Weapon Attack|w=30
:* Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
:* Notes:
:** Use both an action and bonus action, move up to 9m, and make a melee attack with +5 damage.
:** This counts as a single weapon attack, not a full Action, so it is possible to follow up with abilities like Extra Attack.

Charger: Shove|w=30
:* Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way.
:* Notes:
:** Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.
:** This counts as a full Action.

options.name: Crossbow Expert
options.description:
Crossbow Expert: Point-Blank|w=30
:* When you make crossbow attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage.

Crossbow Expert: Wounding|w=30 
:* Your Piercing Shot also inflicts Gaping Wounds for twice as long.

grants.name: Crossbow Expert
grants.description:
Crossbow Expert: Point-Blank|w=30
:* When you make crossbow attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage.

Crossbow Expert: Wounding|w=30 
:* Your Piercing Shot also inflicts Gaping Wounds for twice as long.

options.name: Defensive Duellist
options.description:
Defensive Duellist|w=30
:* When you are attacked with a melee attack while wielding a Finesse Weapon you are Proficient in, you can use a Reaction to increase your ArmourClass by your Proficiency Bonus, possibly causing the attack to miss.

grants.name: Defensive Duellist
grants.description: When you are attacked with a melee attack while wielding a Finesse Weapon you are Proficient in, you can use a Reaction to increase your ArmourClass by your Proficiency Bonus, possibly causing the attack to miss.

options.name: Dual Wielder
options.description:
Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class|w=30
:* You have a +1 bonus to ArmourClass while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

Dual Wielder|w=30
:* You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if your weapons aren't Light You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

grants.name: Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class
grants.description: You have a +1 bonus to ArmourClass while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

grants.name: Dual Wielder
grants.description: You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if the weapons you are wielding aren't Light. You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

options.name: Dungeon Delver
options.description:
Dungeon Delver: Perception|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Perception checks made to detect hidden objects and on SavingThrows made to avoid or resist traps.

Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps|w=30
:* You gain Resistance to the damage dealt by traps.

grants.name: Dungeon Delver: Perception
grants.description: You have Advantage on Perception Checks made to detect hidden objects.

grants.name: Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps
grants.description: You have Advantage on Saving Throws made to avoid traps and Resistance to trap damage.

options.name: Durable
options.description:
Durable|w=30
:* Constitution increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

grants.name: Durable
grants.description: Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

options.name: Elemental Adept
options.description:
* Spells you cast ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. In addition, when you deal that type of damage with a Spell, you cannot roll a 1.

Damage resistance options are one of the following:
* Elemental Adept: Acid
* Elemental Adept: Cold
* Elemental Adept: Lightning
* Elemental Adept: Fire
* Elemental Adept: Thunder

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Acid
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Acid damage. In addition, when you deal Acid damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Cold
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Cold damage. In addition, when you deal Cold damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Lightning
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Lightning damage. In addition, when you deal Lightning damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Fire
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Fire damage. In addition, when you deal Fire damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Thunder
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Thunder damage. In addition, when you deal Thunder damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

options.name: Great Weapon Master
options.description:
Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack|w=30
:* When an attack with a melee weapon lands a Critical Hit or kills a creature, you can make another melee weapon attack as a Bonus Action that turn.

Great Weapon Master: All In|w=30
:* When attacking with a Two-Handed or Versatile melee weapon (in both hands) that you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.
:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack
grants.description: When you land a Critical Hit or kill a target with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus that turn.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: All In
grants.description: When attacking with Heavy melee weapons you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.

options.name: Heavily Armoured
options.description:
Heavily Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with HeavyArmour.

grants.name: Heavily Armoured
grants.description:
You gain Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Medium Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Heavy Armour Master
options.description:
Heavy Armour Master|w=30
:* Increase your Strength by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

grants.name: Heavy Armour Master
grants.description:
Your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

Requires Proficiency with Heavy Armour

options.name: Lightly Armoured
options.description:
Lightly Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with LightArmour.

grants.name: Lightly Armoured
grants.description: You gain Armour Proficiency with Light Armour and your Strength and Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Bard
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Bard|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Bard
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Cleric
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Cleric|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Cleric spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Wisdom.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Cleric
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Cleric spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Wisdom.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Druid
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Druid|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Druid spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Wisdom.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Druid
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Druid spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Wisdom.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Sorcerer
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Sorcerer|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Sorcerer spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Sorcerer
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Sorcerer spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Warlock
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Warlock|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Warlock spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Warlock
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Warlock spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Wizard
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Wizard|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Wizard spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Intelligence.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Wizard
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Wizard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Intelligence.

options.name: Martial Adept
options.description:
Martial Adept|w=30
:* Learn two manoeuvres from the Short or Long Rest.

grants.name: Martial Adept
grants.description: Learn two manoeuvres from the Battle Master archetype and receive 1 (additional) supdie to fuel them. You regain expended Superiority Dice after a Short or Long Rest.

options.name: Medium Armour Master
options.description:
Medium Armour Master|w=30
:* When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to Armour Class you can gain from your Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

grants.name: Medium Armour Master
grants.description:
When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to ArmourClass you can gain from your Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

You must have Proficiency in Medium Armor to take this feat

options.name: Mobile
options.description:
* Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10.

Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain|w=30
:* When you use the Dash action, Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down.

Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke an Opportunity Attack from that target.

grants.name: Mobile
grants.description:
* Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10.

Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain|w=30
:* When you use the Dash action, Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down.

Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke an Opportunity Attack from that target.

options.name: Moderately Armoured
options.description:
Moderately Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with MediumArmour and Shields.

grants.name: Moderately Armoured
grants.description:
You gain Proficiency with Medium Armour and Shields, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Light Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Performer
options.description:
* Increase your Charisma by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Gain Musical Instrument Proficiency.

grants.name: Performer
grants.description:
* Increase your Charisma by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Gain Musical Instrument Proficiency.

options.name: Polearm Master
options.description:
Polearm Master: Bonus Attack|w=30
:* When attacking with a Glaive, Halberd, Quarterstaff, or Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
:* Note: This attack deals 1d4 + Weapon Ability Modifier damage.

Polearm Master: Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

grants.name: Polearm Master: Bonus Attack
grants.description:
When attacking with a Glaive, Halberd, Quarterstaff, or Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
This attack does 1d4|Bludgeoning|modifier=melee

grants.name: Polearm Master: Opportunity Attack
grants.description: You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

options.name: Resilient
options.description:
Resilient|w=30
:* You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency in that ability's SavingThrows.
:* Note: this increase does apply to a druid in wild shape.

grants.name: Resilient
grants.description:
You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Gain Proficiency in that ability's SavingThrow.

options.name: Ritual Caster
options.description:
Ritual Caster: Free Spells|w=30
:* You learn two Ritual_Spell_Icon|24px Ritual Spells of your choice.
:* Note: the spell must be one of these:
:** Enhance Leap
:** Disguise Self
:** Find Familiar
:** Longstrider
:** Speak with Animals
:** Speak with Dead

grants.name: Ritual Caster: Free Spells
grants.description:
You learn two Ritual_Spell_Icon|24px Ritual Spells of your choice from the following: 
* Speak with Dead
* Find Familiar
* Longstrider
* Enhance Leap
* Disguise Self
* Speak with Animals

options.name: Savage Attacker
options.description:
Savage Attacker|w=30
:* When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

grants.name: Savage Attacker
grants.description: When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

options.name: Sentinel
options.description:
Sentinel: Vengeance|w=30
:* When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

Sentinel: Snare|w=30
:* When you hit a creature with an Attack of Opportunity, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

grants.name: Sentinel: Vengeance
grants.description: When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

grants.name: Sentinel: Snare
grants.description: When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

grants.name: Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage
grants.description: You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

options.name: Sharpshooter
options.description:
Sharpshooter: Low Ground|w=30
:* Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

Sharpshooter: All In|w=30
:* Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.
:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Sharpshooter: Low Ground
grants.description: Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

grants.name: Sharpshooter: All In
grants.description:
Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.
(This is a toggleable passive effect)

options.name: Shield Master
options.description:
Shield Master|w=30
:* Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

Shield Master: Block|w=30
:* If a Spell forces you to make a Dexterity Saving Throw, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
:* Notes:
:** On a failed save, you only take half damage.
:** On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

grants.name: Shield Master
grants.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

grants.name: Shield Master: Block
grants.description:
If a Spell forces you to make a DEX, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
* On a failed save, you only take half damage.
* On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

options.name: Skilled
options.description:
Skilled|w=30
:* You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

grants.name: Skilled
grants.description: You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

options.name: Spell Sniper
options.description:
Spell Sniper|w=30
:* You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.
:* Notes:
:** The cantrip you learn must be one of these:
:*** Bone Chill
:*** Eldritch Blast
:*** Fire Bolt
:*** Ray of Frost
:*** Shocking Grasp
:*** Thorn Whip
:** These cantrips do scale with character level, just like a spellcaster's cantrips.

grants.name: Spell Sniper
grants.description:
You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

The cantrip must be one of:
* Bone Chill
* Eldritch Blast
* Fire Bolt
* Ray of Frost
* Shocking Grasp
* Thorn Whip

options.name: Tavern Brawler
options.description:
Tavern Brawler|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Constitution by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your strength modifier is added twice to the damage and Attack Rolls.Bug

grants.name: Tavern Brawler
grants.description:
Increase your Strength or Constitution by 1, to a maximum of 20.

When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your Strength Modifier is added twice to the damage and Attack Rolls.Bug

options.name: Tough
options.description:
Tough|w=30
:* Hit Point maximum increased by 2 for each level.

grants.name: Tough
grants.description: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 2 for every level you have gained.

options.name: War Caster

grants.name: Weapon Master

Gain Proficiency with four Weapon types of your choice.

options.name: Berserker
options.description: Violence is both a means and an end. You follow a path of untrammeled fury, slick with blood, as you thrill in the chaos of battle, heedless of your own well-being.

grants.name: Mindless Rage
grants.description:
Your rage becomes all-consuming, repelling outside influence.

While Frenzied, you can't be Charmed or Frightened, and Calm Emotions no longer ends your rage.

action.name: Calm Emotions
action.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to magically subdue intense emotions in targeted creatures. The affected target becomes neutral to the creatures it is hostile toward. It also cannot be Charmed or Frightened during the duration of the spell.
action.description: Humanoids can't be Charmed, Frightened, or become enraged.
action.notes: * When used on targets who are already Charmed, Frightened, or Enraged, this spell will end those mind-affecting conditions immediately.

options.name: Wild Magic
options.description: The wild influence of magic has transformed you, suffusing you with arcane power that churns within you, waiting to be released.

action.name: Bolstering Magic: Boon
action.summary: Bolstering Magic: Boon is a Wild Magic Barbarian Class Action. This ability gives bonuses to Attack Rolls and Ability Checks for up to a minute, once per long rest.
action.description: You or an ally receive d4|Physical +1d4 bonus to Attack Rolls and Ability Checks for 10 turns.

action.name: Bolstering Magic: Level 1 Spell Slot
action.summary: Bolstering Magic: Level 1 Spell Slot is a Wild Magic Barbarian Class Action. This ability recovers a Level 1 spell slot for you or an ally, once per long rest.
action.description: You or an ally recover a Level 1 Spell Slot

action.name: Bolstering Magic: Level 2 Spell Slot
action.summary: Bolstering Magic: Level 2 Spell Slot is a Wild Magic Barbarian Class Action. This ability recovers a Level 2 spell slot for you or an ally, once per long rest.
action.description: You or an ally recover a Level 2 Spell Slot

options.name: Wildheart

options.name: Elemental Adept
options.description:
* Spells you cast ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. In addition, when you deal that type of damage with a Spell, you cannot roll a 1.

Damage resistance options are one of the following:

* Elemental Adept: Cold
* Elemental Adept: Lightning
* Elemental Adept: Fire
* Elemental Adept: Thunder

options.description: Violence is both a means and an end. You follow a path of untrammeled fury, slick with blood, as you thrill in the chaos of battle, heedless of your own well-being.

action.name: Intimidating Presence
action.summary: Intimidating Presence is a Berserker Action. This ability allows the Barbarian instill fear into their enemies.
action.description:
Menace an enemy and instill a terrible Frightened|Fear within them.

You can use Maintain Intimidating Presence to prolong the targets fear.

action.name: Maintain Intimidating Presence
action.summary: Maintain Intimidating Presence is a Berserker Action. This ability allows the Barbarian to continue to instill fear into their enemies.
action.description: Prolong the Frightened|Fear inflicted on a target by your Intimidating Presence

options.name: Wild Magic
options.description: The wild influence of magic has transformed you, suffusing you with arcane power that churns within you, waiting to be released.

action.name: Unstable Backlash
action.summary: Unstable Backlash is a Wild Magic Barbarian Passive Feature. While raging, receiving damage will trigger the effects of Wild Magic.
action.description: While Raging, when you take damage or fail a Wild Magic effect that replaces the current one.

options.name: Wildheart
options.description: Your attunement with nature and its beasts inspires your rage, empowering you with supernatural might.

grants.name: Relentless Rage
grants.description: Once per Short Rest, if you drop to 0 hit point while Rage|Enraged, you regain 1|Healing instead of being Downed.

options.name: Ability Improvement
options.description:
Note: While technically not a Feat, Ability Improvement is offered within the Feat Selection menu.
* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

grants.name: Ability Improvement
grants.description:
Note: While technically not a Feat, Ability Improvement is offered within the Feat Selection menu.
* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

options.name: Actor
options.description:
* Your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance checks. 
* Note: despite not mentioning this in the tooltip, the character also gains proficiency in these 2 skills if they didn't have those proficiencies yet (game version: 4.36.34458).

options.name: Alert
options.description:
Alert|w=30
:* You gain a +5 bonus to Surprised.

grants.name: Alert
grants.description: You gain +5 to Initiative and can no longer be surprised.

options.name: Athlete
options.description:
Athlete: Standing Up|w=30
:* Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump (Bonus Action)|Jump distance also increases by 50%.

grants.name: Athlete: Standing Up
grants.description: When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump (Bonus Action)|Jump distance also increases by 50%.

options.name: Charger
options.description:
Gain the following weapon attacks:

Charger: Weapon Attack|w=30
:* Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
:* Notes:
:** Use both an action and bonus action, move up to 9m, and make a melee attack with +5 damage.
:** This counts as a single weapon attack, not a full Action, so it is possible to follow up with abilities like Extra Attack.

Charger: Shove|w=30
:* Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way.
:* Notes:
:** Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.
:** This counts as a full Action.

Crossbow Expert: Wounding|w=30

Dual Wielder|w=30
:* You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if your weapons aren't Light You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps|w=30

grants.name: Durable

options.name: Elemental Adept
options.description:
* Spells you cast ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. In addition, when you deal that type of damage with a Spell, you cannot roll a 1.

Damage resistance options are one of the following:
* Elemental Adept: Acid
* Elemental Adept: Cold
* Elemental Adept: Lightning
* Elemental Adept: Fire
* Elemental Adept: Thunder

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Acid
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Acid damage. In addition, when you deal Acid damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Cold
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Cold damage. In addition, when you deal Cold damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Lightning
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Lightning damage. In addition, when you deal Lightning damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Fire
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Fire damage. In addition, when you deal Fire damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Thunder
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Thunder damage. In addition, when you deal Thunder damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

options.name: Great Weapon Master
options.description:
Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack|w=30
:* When an attack with a melee weapon lands a Critical Hit or kills a creature, you can make another melee weapon attack as a Bonus Action that turn.

Great Weapon Master: All In|w=30
:* When attacking with a Two-Handed or Versatile melee weapon (in both hands) that you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.
:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack
grants.description: When you land a Critical Hit or kill a target with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus that turn.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: All In
grants.description: When attacking with Heavy melee weapons you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.

options.name: Heavily Armoured
options.description:
Heavily Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with HeavyArmour.

grants.name: Heavily Armoured
grants.description:
You gain Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Medium Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Heavy Armour Master

Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

Requires Proficiency with Heavy Armour

Shield Master|w=30

If a Spell forces you to make a DEX, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.

* On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

Skilled|w=30

grants.name: Weapon Master
grants.description:
Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.

name: Bard
description: Bard is a character Class in Baldur's Gate 3. Bards are expert storytellers, artists, and performers. Bards channel their power through song, speech, or performance to cast Spells. Bards' use Charisma as their primary ability score.

action.name: Bardic Inspiration
action.summary:
Bardic Inspiration is a Class Feature of a Bard. This ability allows a Bard to inspire their allies and influence the outcome of their rolls. The version at level 5 and onwards is called Improved Bardic Inspiration in the UI. 

See also: The College of Valour enhancement Combat Inspiration
See also: The College of Swords enhancement Blade Flourish
action.description: Inspire an ally to go beyond their capabilities with your performance. They can add a {{DieIcon|d6|Physical+1d6}} bonus to their next Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw.

action.name: Song of Rest
action.summary: Song of Rest is an Action available to the Bard. This ability allows the Bard to restore their allies' strength by granting an additional Short Rest once per day.
action.description: Use your craft to soothe. You and your allies are revitalized as though you had taken a Short Rest.

grants.name: Jack of All Trades
grants.description: Your vast experiences make you more likely to succeed in any undertaking. Add half of your Ability Checks that you are not Proficient in.

options.name: College of Lore
options.description: You pursue beauty and truth, collecting knowledge from scholarly tomes to peasants' tales, and use your gifts to hold both audiences and enemies spellbound.

action.name: Cutting Words
action.summary: Cutting Words is a Reaction available to the College of Lores. This ability allows these Bards to distract and confuse their foes, potentially causing attacks to miss, or ability checks or saving throws to fail.
action.description: Use your wit to distract a creature and sap its confidence. It receives a {{DieIcon|d6|Physical-1d6}} penalty to Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw.

options.name: College of Swords
options.description: Bards of the College of Swords are called blades, and they entertain through daring feats of weapon prowess.

action.name: Defensive Flourish (Melee)
action.summary: Defensive Flourish (Melee) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to enemies with Melee Weapons and increase their own Armour Class if it hits.
action.description: Attack defensively, increasing your Armour Class by 4 if you hit.

action.name: Defensive Flourish (Ranged)
action.summary: Defensive Flourish (Ranged) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to enemies with Ranged Weapons and increase their own Armour Class if it hits.
action.description: Attack defensively, increasing your Armour Class by 4 if you hit.

action.name: Slashing Flourish (Melee)
action.summary: Slashing Flourish (Melee) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to two enemies with a melee weapon.
action.description: Attack up to 2 enemies at once.

action.name: Slashing Flourish (Ranged)
action.summary: Slashing Flourish (Ranged) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to two enemies with a ranged weapon.
action.description: Attack up to 2 enemies at once.

action.name: Mobile Flourish (Melee)
action.summary: Mobile Flourish (Melee) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to a target with a melee weapon, sending them flying backwards. Afterwards, you can teleport next to them.
action.description: Thrust your weapon with enough force to push your target back m=6|ft=20. Afterwards, you can Mobile Flourish: Teleport|Teleport to the target.

action.name: Mobile Flourish (Ranged)
action.summary: Mobile Flourish (Ranged) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to a target with a ranged weapon, sending them flying backwards. Afterwards, you can teleport next to them.
action.description: Thrust your weapon with enough force to push your target back m=6|ft=20. Afterwards, you can Mobile Flourish: Teleport|Teleport to the target.

grants.name: Duelling
grants.description: When you are wielding a melee weapon that is not Two-Handed or Versatile in one hand, and no weapon in the other, you deal an additional 2 damage with that weapon.

grants.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
grants.description: When you make an offhand attack, you can add your Ability Score Modifier to the damage of the attack.

options.name: College of Valour
options.description: You wander the land to witness and relate the deeds of the mighty, keeping alive the memory of heroes of the past and inspiring heroes of the future.

action.name: Combat Inspiration
action.summary:
Combat Inspiration is a Class Feature available to College of Valours. This ability is an enhanced version of Bardic Inspiration that adds the ability to increase the target's armour class and damage.

See also: Bardic Inspiration, the base ability available to non-Valour Bards
action.description: Inspire an ally to add a {{DieIcon|d6|Physical+1d6}} bonus to their next Attack Roll, Ability Check, Saving Throw, weapon damage, or Armour Class.

grants.name: Expertise (Subclass Feature)
grants.description: When a character gains this feature, they may choose two skills they are proficient in and gain expertise in both of those skills.

options.name: Ability Improvement
options.description:
Note: While technically not a Feat, Ability Improvement is offered within the Feat Selection menu.
* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.

options.name: Actor
options.description:
* Your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance checks. 
* Note: despite not mentioning this in the tooltip, the character also gains proficiency in these 2 skills if they didn't have those proficiencies yet (game version: 4.36.34458).

options.name: Alert
options.description:
Alert|w=30
:* You gain a +5 bonus to Surprised.

grants.name: Alert
grants.description: You gain +5 to Initiative and can no longer be surprised.

options.name: Athlete
options.description:
Athlete: Standing Up|w=30
:* Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump (Bonus Action)|Jump distance also increases by 50%.

grants.name: Athlete: Standing Up
grants.description: When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump (Bonus Action)|Jump distance also increases by 50%.

options.name: Charger
options.description:
Gain the following weapon attacks:

Charger: Weapon Attack|w=30
:* Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
:* Notes:
:** Use both an action and bonus action, move up to 9m, and make a melee attack with +5 damage.
:** This counts as a single weapon attack, not a full Action, so it is possible to follow up with abilities like Extra Attack.

Charger: Shove|w=30
:* Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way.
:* Notes:
:** Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.
:** This counts as a full Action.

options.name: Crossbow Expert
options.description:
Crossbow Expert: Point-Blank|w=30
:* When you make crossbow attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage.

Crossbow Expert: Wounding|w=30 
:* Your Piercing Shot also inflicts Gaping Wounds for twice as long.

:* When you make crossbow attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage.

Crossbow Expert: Wounding|w=30

options.name: Defensive Duellist
options.description:
Defensive Duellist|w=30
:* When you are attacked with a melee attack while wielding a Finesse Weapon you are Proficient in, you can use a Reaction to increase your ArmourClass by your Proficiency Bonus, possibly causing the attack to miss.

grants.name: Defensive Duellist
grants.description: When you are attacked with a melee attack while wielding a Finesse Weapon you are Proficient in, you can use a Reaction to increase your ArmourClass by your Proficiency Bonus, possibly causing the attack to miss.

options.name: Dual Wielder
options.description:
Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class|w=30
:* You have a +1 bonus to ArmourClass while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

Dual Wielder|w=30
:* You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if your weapons aren't Light You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

grants.name: Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class
grants.description: You have a +1 bonus to ArmourClass while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

grants.name: Dual Wielder
grants.description: You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if the weapons you are wielding aren't Light. You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

options.name: Dungeon Delver
options.description:
Dungeon Delver: Perception|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Perception checks made to detect hidden objects and on SavingThrows made to avoid or resist traps.

Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps|w=30
:* You gain Resistance to the damage dealt by traps.

grants.name: Dungeon Delver: Perception
grants.description: You have Advantage on Perception Checks made to detect hidden objects.

grants.name: Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps
grants.description: You have Advantage on Saving Throws made to avoid traps and Resistance to trap damage.

options.name: Durable
options.description:
Durable|w=30
:* Constitution increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

grants.name: Durable
grants.description: Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

options.name: Elemental Adept
options.description:
* Spells you cast ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. In addition, when you deal that type of damage with a Spell, you cannot roll a 1.

Damage resistance options are one of the following:
* Elemental Adept: Acid
* Elemental Adept: Cold
* Elemental Adept: Lightning
* Elemental Adept: Fire
* Elemental Adept: Thunder

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Acid
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Acid damage. In addition, when you deal Acid damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Cold
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Cold damage. In addition, when you deal Cold damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Lightning
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Lightning damage. In addition, when you deal Lightning damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Fire
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Fire damage. In addition, when you deal Fire damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Thunder
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Thunder damage. In addition, when you deal Thunder damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

options.name: Great Weapon Master
options.description:
Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack|w=30
:* When an attack with a melee weapon lands a Critical Hit or kills a creature, you can make another melee weapon attack as a Bonus Action that turn.

Great Weapon Master: All In|w=30
:* When attacking with a Two-Handed or Versatile melee weapon (in both hands) that you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.
:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack
grants.description: When you land a Critical Hit or kill a target with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus that turn.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: All In
grants.description: When attacking with Heavy melee weapons you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.

options.name: Heavily Armoured
options.description:
Heavily Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with HeavyArmour.

grants.name: Heavily Armoured
grants.description:
You gain Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Medium Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Heavy Armour Master
options.description:
Heavy Armour Master|w=30
:* Increase your Strength by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

grants.name: Heavy Armour Master
grants.description:
Your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

Requires Proficiency with Heavy Armour

options.name: Lightly Armoured
options.description:
Lightly Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with LightArmour.

grants.name: Lightly Armoured
grants.description: You gain Armour Proficiency with Light Armour and your Strength and Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Bard
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Bard|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Bard
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

options.name: Martial Adept
options.description:
Martial Adept|w=30
:* Learn two manoeuvres from the Short or Long Rest.

grants.name: Martial Adept
grants.description: Learn two manoeuvres from the Battle Master archetype and receive 1 (additional) supdie to fuel them. You regain expended Superiority Dice after a Short or Long Rest.

options.name: Medium Armour Master
options.description:
Medium Armour Master|w=30
:* When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to Armour Class you can gain from your Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

grants.name: Medium Armour Master
grants.description:
When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to ArmourClass you can gain from your Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

You must have Proficiency in Medium Armor to take this feat

options.name: Mobile
options.description:
* Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10.

Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain|w=30
:* When you use the Dash action, Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down.

Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke an Opportunity Attack from that target.

grants.name: Mobile
grants.description:
* Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10.

Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain|w=30
:* When you use the Dash action, Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down.

Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke an Opportunity Attack from that target.

options.name: Moderately Armoured
options.description:
Moderately Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with MediumArmour and Shields.

grants.name: Moderately Armoured
grants.description:
You gain Proficiency with Medium Armour and Shields, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Light Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Performer
options.description:
* Increase your Charisma by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Gain Musical Instrument Proficiency.

grants.name: Performer
grants.description:
* Increase your Charisma by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Gain Musical Instrument Proficiency.

options.name: Polearm Master
options.description:
Polearm Master: Bonus Attack|w=30
:* When attacking with a Glaive, Halberd, Quarterstaff, or Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
:* Note: This attack deals 1d4 + Weapon Ability Modifier damage.

Polearm Master: Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

grants.name: Polearm Master: Bonus Attack
grants.description:
When attacking with a Glaive, Halberd, Quarterstaff, or Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
This attack does 1d4|Bludgeoning|modifier=melee

grants.name: Polearm Master: Opportunity Attack
grants.description: You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

options.name: Resilient
options.description:
Resilient|w=30
:* You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency in that ability's SavingThrows.
:* Note: this increase does apply to a druid in wild shape.

grants.name: Resilient
grants.description:
You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Gain Proficiency in that ability's SavingThrow.

options.name: Ritual Caster
options.description:
Ritual Caster: Free Spells|w=30
:* You learn two Ritual_Spell_Icon|24px Ritual Spells of your choice.
:* Note: the spell must be one of these:
:** Enhance Leap
:** Disguise Self
:** Find Familiar
:** Longstrider
:** Speak with Animals
:** Speak with Dead

grants.name: Ritual Caster: Free Spells
grants.description:
You learn two Ritual_Spell_Icon|24px Ritual Spells of your choice from the following: 
* Speak with Dead
* Find Familiar
* Longstrider
* Enhance Leap
* Disguise Self
* Speak with Animals

options.name: Savage Attacker
options.description:
Savage Attacker|w=30
:* When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

grants.name: Savage Attacker
grants.description: When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

options.name: Sentinel
options.description:
Sentinel: Vengeance|w=30
:* When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

Sentinel: Snare|w=30
:* When you hit a creature with an Attack of Opportunity, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

grants.name: Sentinel: Vengeance
grants.description: When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

grants.name: Sentinel: Snare
grants.description: When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

grants.name: Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage
grants.description: You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

options.name: Sharpshooter
options.description:
Sharpshooter: Low Ground|w=30
:* Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

Sharpshooter: All In|w=30
:* Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.
:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Sharpshooter: Low Ground
grants.description: Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

grants.name: Sharpshooter: All In
grants.description:
Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.
(This is a toggleable passive effect)

options.name: Shield Master
options.description:
Shield Master|w=30
:* Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

Shield Master: Block|w=30
:* If a Spell forces you to make a Dexterity Saving Throw, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
:* Notes:
:** On a failed save, you only take half damage.
:** On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

grants.name: Shield Master
grants.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

grants.name: Shield Master: Block
grants.description:
If a Spell forces you to make a DEX, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
* On a failed save, you only take half damage.
* On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

options.name: Skilled
options.description:
Skilled|w=30
:* You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

grants.name: Skilled
grants.description: You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

options.name: Spell Sniper
options.description:
Spell Sniper|w=30
:* You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.
:* Notes:
:** The cantrip you learn must be one of these:
:*** Bone Chill
:*** Eldritch Blast
:*** Fire Bolt
:*** Ray of Frost
:*** Shocking Grasp
:*** Thorn Whip
:** These cantrips do scale with character level, just like a spellcaster's cantrips.

grants.name: Spell Sniper
grants.description:
You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

The cantrip must be one of:
* Bone Chill
* Eldritch Blast
* Fire Bolt
* Ray of Frost
* Shocking Grasp
* Thorn Whip

options.name: Tavern Brawler
options.description:
Tavern Brawler|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Constitution by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your strength modifier is added twice to the damage and Attack Rolls.Bug

grants.name: Tavern Brawler
grants.description:
Increase your Strength or Constitution by 1, to a maximum of 20.

When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your Strength Modifier is added twice to the damage and Attack Rolls.Bug

options.name: Tough
options.description:
Tough|w=30
:* Hit Point maximum increased by 2 for each level.

grants.name: Tough
grants.description: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 2 for every level you have gained.

options.name: War Caster
options.description:
War Caster: Concentration|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on SavingThrows to maintain Concentration on a Spell.

War Caster: Opportunity Spell|w=30
:* You can also use a Reaction to cast Shocking Grasp at a target moving out of melee range.
:* Note: this feat does not grant the cantrip Shocking Grasp. Unless you know it from another source, you can only  cast it as an Attack of Opportunity.

grants.name: War Caster: Concentration
grants.description: You gain Advantage on SavingThrows to maintain Concentration on a Spell.

grants.name: War Caster: Opportunity Spell
grants.description: You can also use a Reaction to cast Shocking Grasp at a target moving out of melee range.

options.description:
Weapon Master|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with four Weapon types of your choice.

grants.name: Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps
grants.description: You have Advantage on Saving Throws made to avoid traps and Resistance to trap damage.

options.name: Durable

Durable|w=30
:* Constitution increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

grants.name: Durable

options.name: Elemental Adept
options.description:
* Spells you cast ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. In addition, when you deal that type of damage with a Spell, you cannot roll a 1.

Damage resistance options are one of the following:
* Elemental Adept: Acid
* Elemental Adept: Cold
* Elemental Adept: Lightning
* Elemental Adept: Fire
* Elemental Adept: Thunder

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Acid
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Acid damage. In addition, when you deal Acid damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Cold
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Cold damage. In addition, when you deal Cold damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Lightning
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Lightning damage. In addition, when you deal Lightning damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Fire
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Fire damage. In addition, when you deal Fire damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Thunder
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Thunder damage. In addition, when you deal Thunder damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

options.name: Great Weapon Master
options.description:
Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack|w=30
:* When an attack with a melee weapon lands a Critical Hit or kills a creature, you can make another melee weapon attack as a Bonus Action that turn.

Great Weapon Master: All In|w=30
:* When attacking with a Two-Handed or Versatile melee weapon (in both hands) that you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.
:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack
grants.description: When you land a Critical Hit or kill a target with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus that turn.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: All In
grants.description: When attacking with Heavy melee weapons you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.

options.name: Heavily Armoured
options.description:
Heavily Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with HeavyArmour.

grants.name: Heavily Armoured
grants.description:
You gain Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Medium Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Heavy Armour Master
options.description:
Heavy Armour Master|w=30
:* Increase your Strength by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

grants.name: Heavy Armour Master
grants.description:
Your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

Requires Proficiency with Heavy Armour

options.name: Lightly Armoured

Lightly Armoured|w=30

:* Gain Proficiency with LightArmour.

grants.name: Lightly Armoured
grants.description: You gain Armour Proficiency with Light Armour and your Strength and Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

Martial Adept|w=30
:* Learn two manoeuvres from the Short or Long Rest.

grants.name: Martial Adept
grants.description: Learn two manoeuvres from the Battle Master archetype and receive 1 (additional) supdie to fuel them. You regain expended Superiority Dice after a Short or Long Rest.

options.name: Medium Armour Master
options.description:
Medium Armour Master|w=30
:* When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to Armour Class you can gain from your Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

grants.name: Medium Armour Master
grants.description:
When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to ArmourClass you can gain from your Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

You must have Proficiency in Medium Armor to take this feat

options.name: Mobile
options.description:
* Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10.

Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain|w=30
:* When you use the Dash action, Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down.

Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke an Opportunity Attack from that target.

grants.name: Mobile
grants.description:
* Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10.

options.name: Moderately Armoured

Moderately Armoured|w=30

grants.description:
You gain Proficiency with Medium Armour and Shields, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Light Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Polearm Master
options.description:
Polearm Master: Bonus Attack|w=30
:* When attacking with a Glaive, Halberd, Quarterstaff, or Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
:* Note: This attack deals 1d4 + Weapon Ability Modifier damage.

Polearm Master: Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

grants.name: Polearm Master: Bonus Attack
grants.description:
When attacking with a Glaive, Halberd, Quarterstaff, or Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
This attack does 1d4|Bludgeoning|modifier=melee

grants.name: Polearm Master: Opportunity Attack
grants.description: You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

Resilient|w=30

grants.name: Resilient
grants.description:
You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Gain Proficiency in that ability's SavingThrow.

grants.name: Savage Attacker

options.name: Sentinel
options.description:
Sentinel: Vengeance|w=30
:* When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

Sentinel: Snare|w=30
:* When you hit a creature with an Attack of Opportunity, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

grants.name: Sentinel: Vengeance
grants.description: When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

grants.name: Sentinel: Snare
grants.description: When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

grants.name: Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage
grants.description: You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

options.name: Sharpshooter
options.description:
Sharpshooter: Low Ground|w=30

Sharpshooter: All In|w=30

options.name: Shield Master
options.description:
Shield Master|w=30
:* Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

Shield Master: Block|w=30
:* If a Spell forces you to make a Dexterity Saving Throw, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
:* Notes:
:** On a failed save, you only take half damage.
:** On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

grants.name: Shield Master
grants.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

grants.name: Shield Master: Block
grants.description:
If a Spell forces you to make a DEX, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
* On a failed save, you only take half damage.
* On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

options.name: Skilled

Skilled|w=30
:* You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

grants.name: Skilled
grants.description: You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

options.name: Spell Sniper
options.description:
Spell Sniper|w=30
:* You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.
:* Notes:
:** The cantrip you learn must be one of these:
:*** Bone Chill
:*** Eldritch Blast
:*** Fire Bolt
:*** Ray of Frost
:*** Shocking Grasp
:*** Thorn Whip
:** These cantrips do scale with character level, just like a spellcaster's cantrips.

grants.name: Spell Sniper
grants.description:

The cantrip must be one of:
* Bone Chill
* Eldritch Blast
* Fire Bolt
* Ray of Frost
* Shocking Grasp
* Thorn Whip

options.name: Ability Improvement
options.description:
Note: While technically not a Feat, Ability Improvement is offered within the Feat Selection menu.
* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

options.name: Actor
options.description:
* Your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance checks. 
* Note: despite not mentioning this in the tooltip, the character also gains proficiency in these 2 skills if they didn't have those proficiencies yet (game version: 4.36.34458).

options.name: Charger
options.description:
Gain the following weapon attacks:

Charger: Weapon Attack|w=30
:* Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
:* Notes:
:** Use both an action and bonus action, move up to 9m, and make a melee attack with +5 damage.
:** This counts as a single weapon attack, not a full Action, so it is possible to follow up with abilities like Extra Attack.

Charger: Shove|w=30
:* Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way.
:* Notes:
:** Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.
:** This counts as a full Action.

grants.description: Learn two manoeuvres from the Battle Master archetype and receive 1 (additional) supdie to fuel them. You regain expended Superiority Dice after a Short or Long Rest.

:* Gain Proficiency in that ability's SavingThrows.

:** Enhance Leap

Savage Attacker|w=30

options.name: Sentinel
options.description:
Sentinel: Vengeance|w=30
:* When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

Sentinel: Snare|w=30
:* When you hit a creature with an Attack of Opportunity, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

grants.name: Sentinel: Vengeance
grants.description: When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

grants.name: Sentinel: Snare
grants.description: When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

grants.name: Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage

Sharpshooter: Low Ground|w=30

Sharpshooter: All In|w=30

Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.

options.name: Shield Master
options.description:
Shield Master|w=30
:* Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

Shield Master: Block|w=30

:* Notes:
:** On a failed save, you only take half damage.
:** On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

grants.name: Shield Master
grants.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

grants.name: Shield Master: Block
grants.description:
If a Spell forces you to make a DEX, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
* On a failed save, you only take half damage.
* On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

options.name: Skilled

Skilled|w=30

grants.name: Skilled

Spell Sniper|w=30

:*** Eldritch Blast

:*** Ray of Frost
:*** Shocking Grasp
:*** Thorn Whip
:** These cantrips do scale with character level, just like a spellcaster's cantrips.

grants.name: Spell Sniper

You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

The cantrip must be one of:
* Bone Chill
* Eldritch Blast
* Fire Bolt
* Ray of Frost
* Shocking Grasp
* Thorn Whip

Tavern Brawler|w=30
