grants.name: Weapon Master
grants.description:
Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Gain Proficiency with four Weapon types of your choice.

name: Cleric
description: Cleric is a character Class in Baldur's Gate 3. Clerics worship and enact their deities' will to the world, for better or worse. They channel the power of their faith to cast Spells. Clerics use Wisdom as their primary ability score.

options.name: Knowledge Domain
options.description: Adaptable and adroit in all manner of languages and skills, your mind is an intellectual cup brimming with exquisite knowing.

action.name: Command
action.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to order their target to flee, move closer, freeze, drop to the ground, or drop their weapon.
action.description: Command a creature to flee, move closer, freeze, drop to the ground or drop its weapon. The target must succeed on a Wisdom in order to resist the effects.
action.higherLevels: Upcast: Affects an additional target for each Spell Slot Level above 1st.

variants.name: Command: Approach
variants.summary: This spell is a variant of Command. It allows spellcasters to order their target to temporarily approach and do nothing else.
variants.description: Command a creature to move toward you on its turn and do nothing else.
variants.higherLevels: Upcast: Affects an additional target for each Spell Slot Level above 1st.

variants.name: Command: Drop
variants.summary: This spell is a variant of Command. It allows spellcasters to order their target to drop their weapon and do nothing else.
variants.description: Command a creature to drop their weapon on its turn and do nothing else.
variants.higherLevels: Upcast: Affects an additional target for each Spell Slot Level above 1st.

variants.name: Command: Flee
variants.summary: This spell is a variant of Command. It allows spellcasters to order their target to temporarily flee and do nothing else.
variants.description: Command a creature to flee from you on its turn and do nothing else.
variants.higherLevels: Upcast: Affects an additional target for each Spell Slot Level above 1st.

variants.name: Command: Grovel
variants.summary: This spell is a variant of Exhort the Risen and is similar to the spell Command: Grovel except it applies to Undead only. It allows spellcasters to order their Undead target to fall Prone and do nothing.
variants.description: Command an undead to fall Prone on its turn and do nothing else.

variants.name: Command: Halt
variants.summary: This spell is a variant of Command. It allows spellcasters to order their target temporarily from moving or taking Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions.
variants.description: Command a creature to halt, preventing it from moving or taking any type of action.
variants.higherLevels: Upcast: Affects an additional target for each Spell Slot Level above 1st.

action.name: Sleep
action.summary: It allows the spellcaster to temporarily make conscious creatures fall into a deep slumber.
action.description:
Put creatures into a magical slumber. Select targets up to a combined 24 Hit Points.

The condition ends upon taking damage.
action.higherLevels: Upcast: Affect creatures with more hit points at higher levels. The total hit points of creatures this spell can affect is increased by 8 hit points per level.

options.name: Life Domain
options.description: The Life domain is an aspect of many good deities, offering spells that protect and restore the mind, body, and soul.

grants.name: Disciple of Life
grants.description: Your devotion empowers your healing spell, the target regains additional hit points equal to  2 + the spell's level.

action.name: Bless
action.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily bolster themselves and their allies’ attacks and Saving Throws.
action.description: Bless up to 3 creatures. They gain a d4|Slashing +1d4 bonus to Attack Rolls and SavingThrows.
action.higherLevels: Upcast: Affects an additional target for each Spell Slot Level above 1st.

action.name: Cure Wounds
action.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to heal allies with divine magic through touch.
action.description:
Healing|Heal a creature you can touch.

No effect on undead and constructs.
action.higherLevels: Upcast: Heals an additional 1d8|Healing for each Spell Slot Level above 1st.

options.name: Light Domain
options.description: The Light domain is offered by deities of justice, majesty, and primordial flame, providing spells that dispel darkness and harm the undead.

action.name: Warding Flare
action.summary: Warding Flare is a Light Domain Reaction. It allows a Cleric to impose a Disadvantage on an attacker, increasing the chance for the attack to miss.
action.description: Shield yourself with divine light. Use your reaction to impose Disadvantage on an attacker, possibly causing their attack to miss.

action.name: Light
action.summary: It makes an object shed light in a small area.
action.description: Infuse an object with an aura of light. Only affects one target at a time.
action.notes: * When cast on a character, it will apply the effect to their active weapon.

action.name: Burning Hands
action.summary: It allows spellcasters to shoot a flaming cone from their fingertips and deal Fire damage to enemies.
action.description:
Each flammable target is hit with 3d6|Fire Fire|damage.

On Save: Targets still take half damage.
action.notes: * Draconic Bloodline of Red (Fire) Ancestry learns this spell automatically.
action.higherLevels: Upcast: Deals an additional Fire|1d6 Fire damage per level.

action.name: Faerie Fire
action.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to conjure brilliant light. Any creature caught in the radius temporarily sheds faint light and prevents Invisible.
action.description: All targets within the light turn visible, and Attack Rolls against them have Advantage.

options.name: Nature Domain
options.description: You embody the vast viridian power of the natural world, an avatar of the subtle divinity of fruitfall, avian migration, woodland silence, and the landslide's roaring fury.

grants.name: Acolyte of Nature
grants.description:
Learn one of the following cantrips: Poison Spray, Produce Flame, Shillelagh, Thorn Whip.

Get one of the following proficiencies: Animal Handling, Nature, Survival.

action.name: Poison Spray
action.summary: This cantrip allows spellcasters to deal Poison damage to a target.
action.description: Project a puff of noxious gas, dealing 1d12|Poison to a target.
action.higherLevels:
* When the spellcaster reaches Level 5, the damage increases by another d12|Poison Poison|1d12 Poison damage, for a total of 2d12|Poison.
* When the spellcaster reaches Level 10, the damage increases by another d12|Poison Poison|1d12 Poison damage, for a total of 3d12|Poison.

action.name: Produce Flame
action.summary: This cantrip creates a blue flame in the caster's palm that emanates light and can be thrown at enemies.
action.description:
A flame in your hand sheds a light in a m=9|ft=30 radius and deals 1d8|Fire Fire|damage when thrown.

Throwing the flame immediately after you conjure it does not cost an Action. Extinguishing or throwing it on subsequent turns costs an Action. The throw has a range of m=9|ft=30.

action.name: Shillelagh
action.summary: It imbues the caster's weapon with nature power.
action.description:
Quarterstaff or Club Required.

Your staff or d8|Physical}} 1d8 + [[Ability Score Modifier|Wisdom Modifier|Bludgeoning damage, and uses your Spellcasting Ability for Attack Rolls.

action.name: Thorn Whip
action.summary: It deals damage to a target and pulls it closer to the caster.
action.description:
Pulls the creature m=3|ft=10 closer to you.

The target cannot be pulled if it is Huge in size.
action.notes: * Also granted to Warlocks who choose Pact of the Tome as their Pact Boon at level 3.
action.higherLevels:
When the spellcaster reaches Level 5, the damage increases to 2d6|Piercing.
When the spellcaster reaches Level 10, the damage increases to 3d6|Piercing.

action.name: Speak with Animals
action.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to understand and talk to beasts and animals for a day.
action.description: Gain the ability to comprehend and communicate with beasts.
action.notes:
* Wildhearts can cast this spell once per Long Rest.
* Forest Gnomes can cast this spell once per Long Rest.
* Also granted to Warlocks who choose the Eldritch Invocation Beast Speech at level 2+.

action.name: Animal Friendship
action.summary: This spell charms a beast and convinces it you mean no harm.
action.description:
Convince a beast not to attack you.

The creature must have an Intelligence of 3 or less.
Condition ends early if you or an ally hurts the target.
In higher difficulty modes, the target might become hostile when the spell ends.
action.higherLevels: Upcast: Affects an additional target for each Spell Slot Level above 1st.

options.name: Tempest Domain
options.description: Your faith has made you the very thunder that quakes the black firmament, the lightning coursing through the veins of a terrible storm.

action.name: Wrath of the Storm
action.summary: Wrath Of The Storm is a Tempest Domain Reaction. It allows the Cleric to strike back an attacking creature using a reaction, doing Lightning damage or Thunder damage.
action.description: As a reaction, strike back at an attacking creature, dealing 2d8|Lightning or 2d8|Thunder damage. The target takes half damage on a successful SavingThrow.

action.name: Thunderwave
action.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to project out a deafening force that can hit multiple creatures and objects. Creatures hit by this force are potentially pushed away from the spellcaster.
action.description: Release a wave of thunderous force that pushes away all creatures and objects in an area, while also dealing Thunder damage.
action.notes: * If an affected creature passes the SavingThrow, in addition to only taking half damage, they are also not pushed back.
action.higherLevels: Upcast: Casting this spell at a higher level deals an extra 1d8|Thunder damage for each Spell Slot Level above 1st.

action.name: Fog Cloud
action.summary: It allows spellcasters to summon a sphere of fog on an area in range and heavily obscure the area. Creatures within the area are Blinded.
action.description: Create a cloud of dense fog to Heavily Obscured|Heavily Obscure and Blinded|Blind creatures within.
action.notes: * Draconic Bloodline of Bronze (Lightning) Ancestry learns this spell automatically.
action.higherLevels: Upcast: Affects a larger area when cast with Spell Slots of higher Level.

options.name: Trickery Domain
options.description: A domain shared by wicked, chaotic, and mischievous deities alike, those who channel Trickery specialise in deception and illusion magic.

action.name: Blessing of the Trickster
action.summary: Blessing of the Trickster is a Trickery Domain Action. This ability allows a Cleric to improve the Stealth Checks of an allied creature.
action.description:
Grant another creature Advantage on Stealth Checks.

Only affects one target at a time.

action.name: Charm Person
action.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily charm a humanoid creature, granting Advantage on Charisma Checks.
action.description:
Charm a humanoid to prevent it from attacking you. You gain Advantage on Charisma Checks in dialogue.

Enemies have Advantage on SavingThrows against being Charmed.

Condition ends early if you or an ally hurts the target.
In higher difficulty modes, the target might accuse you of enchanting them.
action.higherLevels: Upcast: Affect an additional target for each Spell Slot Level above 1st.

action.name: Disguise Self
action.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily change their appearance. While active, gain access to the action Dispel Disguise to end the effect.
action.description: Magically change all aspects of your appearance.
action.notes:
* Draconic Bloodline of Gold (Fire) Ancestry learns this spell automatically.
* Also granted to Warlocks who choose the Eldritch Invocation Mask of Many Faces at level 2+.
* Can be used to gain race specific bonuses on equipment and dialogue options if the player disguises as the corresponding race.
* Since the spell changes Creature Size it can be used to fit through some entrances with size requirements.
* Allows using Speak with Dead on creatures you've killed yourself.

variants.name: Disguise Self: Femme Dragonborn
variants.summary: It is a variant of Disguise Self. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily change their appearance to the form of a feminine Dragonborn.
variants.description: Disguise yourself as a dragonborn with a feminine body type.

variants.name: Disguise Self: Masc Dragonborn
variants.summary: It is a variant of Disguise Self. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily change their appearance to the form of a masculine Dragonborn.
variants.description: Disguise yourself as a dragonborn with a masculine body type.

variants.name: Disguise Self: Femme Drow
variants.summary: It is a variant of Disguise Self. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily change their appearance to the form of a feminine Seldarine Drow.
variants.description: Disguise yourself as a drow with a feminine body type.

variants.name: Disguise Self: Masc Drow
variants.summary: It is a variant of Disguise Self. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily change their appearance to the form of a masculine Seldarine Drow.
variants.description: Disguise yourself as a drow with a masculine body type.

variants.summary: It is a variant of Disguise Self. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily change their appearance to the strong form of a feminine Seldarine Drow.

variants.summary: It is a variant of Disguise Self. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily change their appearance to the strong form of a masculine Seldarine Drow.
variants.description: Disguise yourself as a drow with a strong masculine body type.

variants.name: Disguise Self: Femme Dwarf
variants.summary: It is a variant of Disguise Self. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily change their appearance to the form of a feminine Gold Dwarf.
variants.description: Disguise yourself as a dwarf with a feminine body type.

variants.name: Disguise Self: Masc Dwarf
variants.summary: It is a variant of Disguise Self. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily change their appearance to the form of a masculine Gold Dwarf.
variants.description: Disguise yourself as a dwarf with a masculine body type.

variants.name: Disguise Self: Femme Elf
variants.summary: It is a variant of Disguise Self. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily change their appearance to the form of a feminine High Elf.
variants.description: Disguise yourself as an elf with a feminine body type.

variants.name: Disguise Self: Masc Elf
variants.summary: It is a variant of Disguise Self. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily change their appearance to the form of a masculine High Elf.
variants.description: Disguise yourself as an elf with a masculine body type.

variants.name: Disguise Self: Femme Strong Elf
variants.summary: It is a variant of Disguise Self. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily change their appearance to the strong form of a feminine High Elf.
variants.description: Disguise yourself as an elf with a strong feminine body type.

variants.name: Disguise Self: Masc Strong Elf
variants.summary: It is a variant of Disguise Self. This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily change their appearance to the strong form of a masculine High Elf.

options.name: War Domain
options.description: Fortified by holy zeal, you brandish an arsenal of sacramental savagery to use against those you deem unrighteous.

action.name: War Priest
action.summary: War Priest is a War Domain passive that allows the Cleric to attack using a bonus and a War Priest.
action.description:
When you make an unarmed or weapon attack, you can spend a War Priest to make an additional attack as a bonus.

A War Domain Cleric begins with three War Priest|forceplural=yes per long rest. This increases to:

* Four charges at Cleric Level 5
* Five charges at Cleric Level 8
* Six charges at Cleric Level 11

action.name: Divine Favour
action.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to empower their Weapons to deal extra Radiant|Radiant damage.
action.description: Your prayer empowers you with divine radiance. Your weapons deal an additional 1d4|Radiant damage.

action.name: Shield of Faith
action.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to surround themselves or an ally with divine protection and gain a bonus to their Armour Class.
action.description: Surround a creature with a shimmering field of magic that increases its Armour Class by 2.
action.notes:
* Also granted by Sword of Justice as Tyr's Protection with Short Rest.
* Also granted by Dark Justiciar Half-Plate (Rare) and Dark Justiciar Half-Plate (Very Rare) as Shar's Aegis with Long Rest.
* Larian Homebrew: In the original D&D 5th Edition Tabletop the spell only lasts a maximum of 10 minutes (100 Turns).

action.name: Turn Undead
action.summary: As an action, present your holy symbol and cause undead creatures to flee.
action.description:
Pray to Turn all undead that can see you.

The condition ends upon taking damage.

options.name: Knowledge Domain
options.description: Adaptable and adroit in all manner of languages and skills, your mind is an intellectual cup brimming with exquisite knowing.

grants.name: Knowledge of the Ages
grants.description: Gain Ability.

options.name: Life Domain
options.description: The Life domain is an aspect of many good deities, offering spells that protect and restore the mind, body, and soul.

action.name: Preserve Life
action.summary: Preserve Life is an Action available to Life Domains. This ability allows these Clerics to heal their allies.
action.description:
Evoke a healing energy that restores 3 x Cleric Level|Healing to allied creatures.

Has no effect on undead and constructs.

options.name: Light Domain
options.description: The Light domain is offered by deities of justice, majesty, and primordial flame, providing spells that dispel darkness and harm the undead.

action.name: Radiance of the Dawn
action.summary: Radiance of the Dawn is a Light Domain Action. This ability allows the Cleric to channel divine power and deal Radiant damage to enemies.
action.description:
Harness the sun's divine power to dispel any magical darkness and deal 2d10 + Character Level|Radiant damage to hostile creatures.

On a successful save, targets still take half damage. Doesn't affect creatures that have total cover from you.

options.name: Nature Domain
options.description: You embody the vast viridian power of the natural world, an avatar of the subtle divinity of fruitfall, avian migration, woodland silence, and the landslide's roaring fury.

action.name: Charm Animals and Plants
action.summary: Charm Animals and Plants is an Action available to Nature Domains. This ability allows these Clerics to reduce the aggressiveness of nearby fauna and flora.
action.description: Channel fey magic to Charmed|Charm nearby beasts and plants.

options.name: Tempest Domain
options.description: Your faith has made you the very thunder that quakes the black firmament, the lightning coursing through the veins of a terrible storm.

action.name: Destructive Wrath
action.summary: Destructive Wrath is a Reaction available to Tempest Domains. This ability allows these Clerics to deal maximum damage when dealing Thunder|Thunder or Lightning|Lightning damage.
action.description: When you roll Thunder or Lightning damage, you can use your Channel Divinity to deal maximum damage instead.

options.name: Trickery Domain
options.description: A domain shared by wicked, chaotic, and mischievous deities alike, those who channel Trickery specialise in deception and illusion magic.

action.name: Invoke Duplicity
action.summary: Invoke Duplicity is a Trickery Domain Action. This ability allows a Cleric to summon an illusory duplicate of themselves that improves the hit chances of allied creatures against nearby enemies.
action.description: Summon an illusion to distract your enemies. You and your allies receive Advantage on Attack Rolls against a creature if both the attacker and the illusion are within 3m / 10ft of it.

options.name: War Domain
options.description: Fortified by holy zeal, you brandish an arsenal of sacramental savagery to use against those you deem unrighteous.

grants.name: Guided Strike
grants.description: Guided Strike is a Reaction available to War Domain Clerics. This ability allows these Clerics to gain +10 to an Attack Roll at the cost of one Channel Divinity Charge. This does not cost a Reaction to use.

options.name: Ability Improvement
options.description:
Note: While technically not a Feat, Ability Improvement is offered within the Feat Selection menu.
* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

grants.name: Ability Improvement
grants.description:
Note: While technically not a Feat, Ability Improvement is offered within the Feat Selection menu.
* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

options.name: Actor
options.description:
* Your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance checks. 
* Note: despite not mentioning this in the tooltip, the character also gains proficiency in these 2 skills if they didn't have those proficiencies yet (game version: 4.36.34458).

grants.name: Actor
grants.description:
* Your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance checks. 
* Note: despite not mentioning this in the tooltip, the character also gains proficiency in these 2 skills if they didn't have those proficiencies yet (game version: 4.36.34458).

options.name: Alert
options.description:
Alert|w=30
:* You gain a +5 bonus to Surprised.

grants.name: Alert
grants.description: You gain +5 to Initiative and can no longer be surprised.

options.name: Athlete
options.description:
Athlete: Standing Up|w=30
:* Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump (Bonus Action)|Jump distance also increases by 50%.

grants.name: Athlete: Standing Up
grants.description: When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump (Bonus Action)|Jump distance also increases by 50%.

options.name: Charger
options.description:
Gain the following weapon attacks:

Charger: Weapon Attack|w=30
:* Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
:* Notes:
:** Use both an action and bonus action, move up to 9m, and make a melee attack with +5 damage.
:** This counts as a single weapon attack, not a full Action, so it is possible to follow up with abilities like Extra Attack.

Charger: Shove|w=30
:* Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way.
:* Notes:
:** Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.
:** This counts as a full Action.

grants.name: Charger
grants.description:
Gain the following weapon attacks:

Charger: Weapon Attack|w=30
:* Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
:* Notes:

Charger: Shove|w=30
:* Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way.
:* Notes:
:** Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.
:** This counts as a full Action.

options.name: Crossbow Expert
options.description:
Crossbow Expert: Point-Blank|w=30
:* When you make crossbow attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage.

Crossbow Expert: Wounding|w=30 
:* Your Piercing Shot also inflicts Gaping Wounds for twice as long.

grants.name: Crossbow Expert
grants.description:
Crossbow Expert: Point-Blank|w=30
:* When you make crossbow attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage.

Crossbow Expert: Wounding|w=30 
:* Your Piercing Shot also inflicts Gaping Wounds for twice as long.

options.name: Defensive Duellist
options.description:
Defensive Duellist|w=30
:* When you are attacked with a melee attack while wielding a Finesse Weapon you are Proficient in, you can use a Reaction to increase your ArmourClass by your Proficiency Bonus, possibly causing the attack to miss.

grants.name: Defensive Duellist
grants.description: When you are attacked with a melee attack while wielding a Finesse Weapon you are Proficient in, you can use a Reaction to increase your ArmourClass by your Proficiency Bonus, possibly causing the attack to miss.

options.name: Dual Wielder
options.description:
Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class|w=30
:* You have a +1 bonus to ArmourClass while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

Dual Wielder|w=30
:* You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if your weapons aren't Light You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

grants.name: Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class
grants.description: You have a +1 bonus to ArmourClass while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

grants.name: Dual Wielder
grants.description: You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if the weapons you are wielding aren't Light. You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

options.name: Dungeon Delver
options.description:
Dungeon Delver: Perception|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Perception checks made to detect hidden objects and on SavingThrows made to avoid or resist traps.

Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps|w=30
:* You gain Resistance to the damage dealt by traps.

grants.name: Dungeon Delver: Perception
grants.description: You have Advantage on Perception Checks made to detect hidden objects.

grants.name: Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps
grants.description: You have Advantage on Saving Throws made to avoid traps and Resistance to trap damage.

options.name: Durable
options.description:
Durable|w=30
:* Constitution increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

grants.name: Durable
grants.description: Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

options.name: Elemental Adept
options.description:
* Spells you cast ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. In addition, when you deal that type of damage with a Spell, you cannot roll a 1.

Damage resistance options are one of the following:
* Elemental Adept: Acid
* Elemental Adept: Cold
* Elemental Adept: Lightning
* Elemental Adept: Fire
* Elemental Adept: Thunder

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Acid
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Acid damage. In addition, when you deal Acid damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Cold
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Cold damage. In addition, when you deal Cold damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Lightning
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Lightning damage. In addition, when you deal Lightning damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Fire
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Fire damage. In addition, when you deal Fire damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Thunder
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Thunder damage. In addition, when you deal Thunder damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

options.name: Great Weapon Master
options.description:
Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack|w=30
:* When an attack with a melee weapon lands a Critical Hit or kills a creature, you can make another melee weapon attack as a Bonus Action that turn.

Great Weapon Master: All In|w=30
:* When attacking with a Two-Handed or Versatile melee weapon (in both hands) that you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.
:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack
grants.description: When you land a Critical Hit or kill a target with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus that turn.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: All In
grants.description: When attacking with Heavy melee weapons you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.

options.name: Heavily Armoured
options.description:
Heavily Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with HeavyArmour.

grants.name: Heavily Armoured
grants.description:
You gain Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Medium Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Heavy Armour Master
options.description:
Heavy Armour Master|w=30
:* Increase your Strength by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

grants.name: Heavy Armour Master
grants.description:
Your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

Requires Proficiency with Heavy Armour

options.name: Lightly Armoured
options.description:
Lightly Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with LightArmour.

grants.name: Lightly Armoured
grants.description: You gain Armour Proficiency with Light Armour and your Strength and Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Bard
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Bard|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Bard
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Cleric
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Cleric|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Cleric spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Wisdom.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Cleric
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Cleric spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Wisdom.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Druid
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Druid|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Druid spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Wisdom.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Druid
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Druid spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Wisdom.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Sorcerer
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Sorcerer|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Sorcerer spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Sorcerer
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Sorcerer spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Warlock
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Warlock|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Warlock spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Warlock
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Warlock spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Wizard
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Wizard|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Wizard spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Intelligence.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Wizard
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Wizard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Intelligence.

options.name: Martial Adept
options.description:
Martial Adept|w=30
:* Learn two manoeuvres from the Short or Long Rest.

grants.name: Martial Adept
grants.description: Learn two manoeuvres from the Battle Master archetype and receive 1 (additional) supdie to fuel them. You regain expended Superiority Dice after a Short or Long Rest.

options.name: Medium Armour Master
options.description:
Medium Armour Master|w=30
:* When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to Armour Class you can gain from your Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

grants.name: Medium Armour Master
grants.description:
When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to ArmourClass you can gain from your Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

You must have Proficiency in Medium Armor to take this feat

options.name: Mobile
options.description:
* Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10.

Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain|w=30
:* When you use the Dash action, Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down.

Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke an Opportunity Attack from that target.

grants.name: Mobile
grants.description:
* Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10.

Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain|w=30
:* When you use the Dash action, Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down.

Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke an Opportunity Attack from that target.

options.name: Moderately Armoured
options.description:
Moderately Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with MediumArmour and Shields.

grants.name: Moderately Armoured
grants.description:
You gain Proficiency with Medium Armour and Shields, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Light Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Performer
options.description:
* Increase your Charisma by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Gain Musical Instrument Proficiency.

grants.name: Performer
grants.description:
* Increase your Charisma by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Gain Musical Instrument Proficiency.

options.name: Polearm Master
options.description:
Polearm Master: Bonus Attack|w=30
:* When attacking with a Glaive, Halberd, Quarterstaff, or Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
:* Note: This attack deals 1d4 + Weapon Ability Modifier damage.

Polearm Master: Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

grants.name: Polearm Master: Bonus Attack
grants.description:
When attacking with a Glaive, Halberd, Quarterstaff, or Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
This attack does 1d4|Bludgeoning|modifier=melee

grants.name: Polearm Master: Opportunity Attack
grants.description: You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

options.name: Resilient
options.description:
Resilient|w=30
:* You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency in that ability's SavingThrows.
:* Note: this increase does apply to a druid in wild shape.

grants.name: Resilient
grants.description:
You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Gain Proficiency in that ability's SavingThrow.

options.name: Ritual Caster
options.description:
Ritual Caster: Free Spells|w=30
:* You learn two Ritual_Spell_Icon|24px Ritual Spells of your choice.
:* Note: the spell must be one of these:
:** Enhance Leap
:** Disguise Self
:** Find Familiar
:** Longstrider
:** Speak with Animals
:** Speak with Dead

grants.name: Ritual Caster: Free Spells
grants.description:
You learn two Ritual_Spell_Icon|24px Ritual Spells of your choice from the following: 
* Speak with Dead
* Find Familiar
* Longstrider
* Enhance Leap
* Disguise Self
* Speak with Animals

options.name: Savage Attacker
options.description:
Savage Attacker|w=30
:* When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

grants.name: Savage Attacker
grants.description: When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

options.name: Sentinel
options.description:
Sentinel: Vengeance|w=30
:* When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

Sentinel: Snare|w=30
:* When you hit a creature with an Attack of Opportunity, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

grants.name: Sentinel: Vengeance
grants.description: When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

grants.name: Sentinel: Snare
grants.description: When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

grants.name: Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage
grants.description: You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

options.name: Sharpshooter
options.description:
Sharpshooter: Low Ground|w=30
:* Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

Sharpshooter: All In|w=30
:* Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.
:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Sharpshooter: Low Ground
grants.description: Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

grants.name: Sharpshooter: All In
grants.description:
Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.
(This is a toggleable passive effect)

options.name: Shield Master
options.description:
Shield Master|w=30
:* Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

Shield Master: Block|w=30
:* If a Spell forces you to make a Dexterity Saving Throw, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
:* Notes:
:** On a failed save, you only take half damage.
:** On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

grants.name: Shield Master

options.name: Knowledge Domain
options.description: Adaptable and adroit in all manner of languages and skills, your mind is an intellectual cup brimming with exquisite knowing.

options.name: Life Domain
options.description: The Life domain is an aspect of many good deities, offering spells that protect and restore the mind, body, and soul.

grants.name: Blessed Healer
grants.description:
Healing others heals you as well.

When you cast a healing spell of Level 1 or higher on another creature, you regain hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level|Healing.

options.name: Light Domain
options.description: The Light domain is offered by deities of justice, majesty, and primordial flame, providing spells that dispel darkness and harm the undead.

grants.name: Improved Warding Flare
grants.description: When an enemy attacks an ally, you can use your reaction to impose Disadvantage on the Attack Roll, possibly causing their attack to miss.

options.name: Nature Domain
options.description: You embody the vast viridian power of the natural world, an avatar of the subtle divinity of fruitfall, avian migration, woodland silence, and the landslide's roaring fury.

options.name: Tempest Domain
options.description: Your faith has made you the very thunder that quakes the black firmament, the lightning coursing through the veins of a terrible storm.

grants.name: Thunderbolt Strike
grants.description: When you deal Thunder or Lightning damage to a creature that is Large or smaller, you can also push it up to m=3|ft=10.

options.name: Trickery Domain
options.description: A domain shared by wicked, chaotic, and mischievous deities alike, those who channel Trickery specialise in deception and illusion magic.

options.name: War Domain
options.description: Fortified by holy zeal, you brandish an arsenal of sacramental savagery to use against those you deem unrighteous.

grants.name: War God's Blessing
grants.description: War God's Blessing is a Reaction available to War Domain Clerics. This ability allows these Clerics to grant their ally a +10 to an Attack Roll at the cost of one Channel Divinity Charge. This does not cost a Reaction to use.

options.name: Ability Improvement

* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

options.name: Charger

Charger: Shove|w=30
:* Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way.
:* Notes:
:** Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.
:** This counts as a full Action.

action.name: Divine Intervention
action.summary: Divine Intervention is a Cleric one-time class action that can perform one of several large-scale actions.
action.description: Call upon your deity in your moment of greatest need. Once they interfere, your deity will never do so again in this manner.
action.notes:
A character cannot use Divine Intervention more than once, even by respecing. However, you can use respecing to get Divine Intervention a number of times equal to the number of characters you have available, since each character may use it once. Both Arm Thy Servant and Golden Generosity can be used outside of combat and the items they create stick around indefinitely (although, of course, the items created by Golden Generosity are consumable).

The items generated in the Bestowed Bounty are tied to each save. The first cast of Bestowed Bounty on a save will always give the same items, the second a different set, and so on. This means that save-scumming to get a better roll on the chest is not possible.

The base value of the Devotee's Mace, created by Arm Thy Servant, is 640 gold. It costs 200 gold to respec a character into a cleric, create the Devotee's Mace, and then change back (or to recruit a hireling and respec them into a cleric). You could use this as a source of cash, if you were somehow running low on funds at level 10.

name: Druid
description: Druid is a character Class in Baldur's Gate 3. Druids are closely attuned with nature and the animals that live in it. They utilize the power of nature to cast Spells and have the ability to transform into various creatures. Druids use Wisdom as their primary ability score.

action.name: Wild Shape
action.summary:
Wild Shape is an Action gained by Druids at Level 2 that allows them to magically transform into various creatures in order to fight in combat or explore the environment.

See also: Combat Wild Shape, the Circle of the Moon enhanced version with extra exclusive forms.
action.description:
Magically assume the shape of a beast. While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast Spells.

You can take on the attributes your beast form -- excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

When your beast form drops to 0 Hit Points, you revert to your normal form.

options.name: Circle of the Land
options.description: Druids of this Circle connect to powerful magic that flows through the earth and binds all living things together.

action.name: Natural Recovery
action.summary: Natural Recovery is a Spell Slots once per day.
action.description:
Available only out of combat.

Once per day while out of combat, you can replenish expended Spell Slots.

action.name: Guidance
action.summary: This cantrip allows spellcasters to grant a temporary bonus to a creature's Ability Checks.
action.description:
The target gains d4|Physical +1d4 bonus to Ability Checks.

10
action.notes: * Also granted to Warlocks who choose Pact of the Tome as their Pact Boon at level 3.

action.name: Poison Spray
action.summary: This cantrip allows spellcasters to deal Poison damage to a target.
action.description: Project a puff of noxious gas, dealing 1d12|Poison to a target.
action.higherLevels:
* When the spellcaster reaches Level 5, the damage increases by another d12|Poison Poison|1d12 Poison damage, for a total of 2d12|Poison.
* When the spellcaster reaches Level 10, the damage increases by another d12|Poison Poison|1d12 Poison damage, for a total of 3d12|Poison.

action.name: Produce Flame
action.summary: This cantrip creates a blue flame in the caster's palm that emanates light and can be thrown at enemies.
action.description:
A flame in your hand sheds a light in a m=9|ft=30 radius and deals 1d8|Fire Fire|damage when thrown.

Throwing the flame immediately after you conjure it does not cost an Action. Extinguishing or throwing it on subsequent turns costs an Action. The throw has a range of m=9|ft=30.

action.name: Resistance
action.summary: This cantrip grants a temporary bonus to a creature's SavingThrows.
action.description: Make a target more resistant to spell effects and conditions: it receives a d4|Physical +1d4 bonus to SavingThrows.

action.name: Shillelagh
action.summary: It imbues the caster's weapon with nature power.
action.description:
Quarterstaff or Club Required.

Your staff or d8|Physical}} 1d8 + [[Ability Score Modifier|Wisdom Modifier|Bludgeoning damage, and uses your Spellcasting Ability for Attack Rolls.

action.name: Thorn Whip
action.summary: It deals damage to a target and pulls it closer to the caster.
action.description:
Pulls the creature m=3|ft=10 closer to you.

The target cannot be pulled if it is Huge in size.
action.notes: * Also granted to Warlocks who choose Pact of the Tome as their Pact Boon at level 3.
action.higherLevels:
When the spellcaster reaches Level 5, the damage increases to 2d6|Piercing.
When the spellcaster reaches Level 10, the damage increases to 3d6|Piercing.

options.name: Circle of the Moon
options.description: Druids sworn to the moon draw on its mercurial nature to transform into massive creatures and primal elementals.

action.name: Lunar Mend
action.summary: Lunar Mend is a Circle of the Moon Bonus Action available while wildshaped. This ability allows the wildshaped Druid to heal themselves.
action.description:
Expend Spell Slots to regain Hit Points while wild shaped.

You regain 1d8|Healing per Spell Slot level.

action.name: Wild Shape
action.summary:
Wild Shape is an Action gained by Druids at Level 2 that allows them to magically transform into various creatures in order to fight in combat or explore the environment.

See also: Combat Wild Shape, the Circle of the Moon enhanced version with extra exclusive forms.
action.description:
Magically assume the shape of a beast. While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast Spells.

You can take on the attributes your beast form -- excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

When your beast form drops to 0 Hit Points, you revert to your normal form.

action.name: Combat Wild Shape
action.summary: Combat Wild Shape is a Circle of the Moon Druid Bonus Action that allows them to Wild Shape. They gain access to all base Druid Wild Shape forms as well as their own exclusive forms.
action.description:
As a Bonus Action, you can assume the form of a beast. You can transform twice per Short Rest.

This ability otherwise acts as Wild Shape.

action.name: Wild Shape
action.summary:
Wild Shape is an Action gained by Druids at Level 2 that allows them to magically transform into various creatures in order to fight in combat or explore the environment.

See also: Combat Wild Shape, the Circle of the Moon enhanced version with extra exclusive forms.
action.description:
Magically assume the shape of a beast. While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast Spells.

You can take on the attributes your beast form -- excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

When your beast form drops to 0 Hit Points, you revert to your normal form.

action.name: Wild Shape: Bear
action.summary: Wild Shape: Bear is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moon Druids.
action.description: Take the shape of a Bear with high Hit Points that can goad enemies into attacking it.

options.name: Circle of the Spores
options.description: Viewing death, necrosis, fungal growth, and sporulation as just another part of life, you can manipulate such spores to augment yourself and harm your foes.

action.name: Bone Chill
action.summary: It deals Necrotic damage and prevents the target from regaining Hit Points.
action.description: Prevent the target from healing until your next turn. An undead target receives Disadvantage on Attack Rolls.
action.higherLevels:
When the spellcaster reaches Level 5, the damage increases by another d8|Necrotic Necrotic|1d8 Necrotic damage, for a total of 2d8|Necrotic.
When the spellcaster reaches Level 10, the damage increases by another d8|Necrotic Necrotic|1d8 Necrotic damage, for a total of 3d8|Necrotic.

action.name: Halo of Spores
action.summary: Halo of Spores is a Circle of the Spores Reaction. It releases spores that deal Necrotic damage to a nearby target.
action.description: Unleash a cloud of necrotic spores upon a target. This uses a reaction, so other reactions won't trigger this turn.

action.name: Symbiotic Entity
action.summary:
Symbiotic Entity is a Circle of the Spores Action that consumes one Wild Shape Charge. It grants you temporary hit points, and until they're gone:
* your weapon and unarmed attacks deal additional Necrotic|necrotic damage, and
* you deal double damage with Halo of Spores.
action.description: Gain Healing|4 Temporary Hit Points per Druid level and deal an additional 1d6|Necrotic damage while you have them. Cast Halo of Spores with double damage.

action.name: Halo of Spores
action.summary: Halo of Spores is a Circle of the Spores Reaction. It releases spores that deal Necrotic damage to a nearby target.
action.description: Unleash a cloud of necrotic spores upon a target. This uses a reaction, so other reactions won't trigger this turn.

* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

* Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance checks. 
* Note: despite not mentioning this in the tooltip, the character also gains proficiency in these 2 skills if they didn't have those proficiencies yet (game version: 4.36.34458).

options.name: Charger

Gain the following weapon attacks:

Charger: Weapon Attack|w=30
:* Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
:* Notes:
:** Use both an action and bonus action, move up to 9m, and make a melee attack with +5 damage.
:** This counts as a single weapon attack, not a full Action, so it is possible to follow up with abilities like Extra Attack.

Charger: Shove|w=30
:* Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way.
:* Notes:
:** Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.
:** This counts as a full Action.

options.name: Elemental Adept
options.description:
* Spells you cast ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. In addition, when you deal that type of damage with a Spell, you cannot roll a 1.

Damage resistance options are one of the following:
* Elemental Adept: Acid
* Elemental Adept: Cold
* Elemental Adept: Lightning
* Elemental Adept: Fire
* Elemental Adept: Thunder

:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

action.name: Halo of Spores
action.summary: Halo of Spores is a Circle of the Spores Reaction. It releases spores that deal Necrotic damage to a nearby target.
action.description: Unleash a cloud of necrotic spores upon a target. This uses a reaction, so other reactions won't trigger this turn.

action.name: Fungal Infestation
action.summary: Fungal Infestation is a reaction gained by Circle of the Sporess at Level 6 that allows them to raise a Fungal Zombie from a nearby corpse using a resource exclusive to this action.
action.description:
Raises a mildewed, mould-encrusted zombie from a corpse.

Target must be a beast or humanoid corpse.

options.name: Ability Improvement
options.description:
Note: While technically not a Feat, Ability Improvement is offered within the Feat Selection menu.
* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

grants.name: Ability Improvement
grants.description:
Note: While technically not a Feat, Ability Improvement is offered within the Feat Selection menu.
* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

options.name: Actor
options.description:
* Your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance checks. 
* Note: despite not mentioning this in the tooltip, the character also gains proficiency in these 2 skills if they didn't have those proficiencies yet (game version: 4.36.34458).

grants.name: Actor
grants.description:
* Your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance checks. 
* Note: despite not mentioning this in the tooltip, the character also gains proficiency in these 2 skills if they didn't have those proficiencies yet (game version: 4.36.34458).

options.name: Alert
options.description:
Alert|w=30
:* You gain a +5 bonus to Surprised.

grants.name: Alert
grants.description: You gain +5 to Initiative and can no longer be surprised.

options.name: Athlete
options.description:
Athlete: Standing Up|w=30
:* Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump (Bonus Action)|Jump distance also increases by 50%.

grants.name: Athlete: Standing Up
grants.description: When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump (Bonus Action)|Jump distance also increases by 50%.

options.name: Charger
options.description:
Gain the following weapon attacks:

Charger: Weapon Attack|w=30
:* Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
:* Notes:
:** Use both an action and bonus action, move up to 9m, and make a melee attack with +5 damage.
:** This counts as a single weapon attack, not a full Action, so it is possible to follow up with abilities like Extra Attack.

Charger: Shove|w=30
:* Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way.
:* Notes:
:** Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.
:** This counts as a full Action.

grants.name: Charger
grants.description:
Gain the following weapon attacks:

Charger: Weapon Attack|w=30
:* Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
:* Notes:
:** Use both an action and bonus action, move up to 9m, and make a melee attack with +5 damage.
:** This counts as a single weapon attack, not a full Action, so it is possible to follow up with abilities like Extra Attack.

Charger: Shove|w=30
:* Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way.
:* Notes:
:** Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.
:** This counts as a full Action.

options.name: Crossbow Expert
options.description:
Crossbow Expert: Point-Blank|w=30
:* When you make crossbow attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage.

Crossbow Expert: Wounding|w=30 
:* Your Piercing Shot also inflicts Gaping Wounds for twice as long.

grants.name: Crossbow Expert
grants.description:
Crossbow Expert: Point-Blank|w=30
:* When you make crossbow attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage.

Crossbow Expert: Wounding|w=30 
:* Your Piercing Shot also inflicts Gaping Wounds for twice as long.

options.name: Defensive Duellist
options.description:
Defensive Duellist|w=30
:* When you are attacked with a melee attack while wielding a Finesse Weapon you are Proficient in, you can use a Reaction to increase your ArmourClass by your Proficiency Bonus, possibly causing the attack to miss.

grants.name: Defensive Duellist
grants.description: When you are attacked with a melee attack while wielding a Finesse Weapon you are Proficient in, you can use a Reaction to increase your ArmourClass by your Proficiency Bonus, possibly causing the attack to miss.

options.name: Dual Wielder
options.description:
Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class|w=30
:* You have a +1 bonus to ArmourClass while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

Dual Wielder|w=30
:* You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if your weapons aren't Light You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

grants.name: Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class
grants.description: You have a +1 bonus to ArmourClass while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

grants.name: Dual Wielder
grants.description: You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if the weapons you are wielding aren't Light. You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

options.name: Dungeon Delver
options.description:
Dungeon Delver: Perception|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Perception checks made to detect hidden objects and on SavingThrows made to avoid or resist traps.

Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps|w=30
:* You gain Resistance to the damage dealt by traps.

grants.name: Dungeon Delver: Perception
grants.description: You have Advantage on Perception Checks made to detect hidden objects.

grants.name: Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps
grants.description: You have Advantage on Saving Throws made to avoid traps and Resistance to trap damage.

options.name: Durable
options.description:
Durable|w=30
:* Constitution increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

grants.name: Durable
grants.description: Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

options.name: Elemental Adept
options.description:
* Spells you cast ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. In addition, when you deal that type of damage with a Spell, you cannot roll a 1.

Damage resistance options are one of the following:
* Elemental Adept: Acid
* Elemental Adept: Cold
* Elemental Adept: Lightning
* Elemental Adept: Fire
* Elemental Adept: Thunder

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Acid
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Acid damage. In addition, when you deal Acid damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Cold
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Cold damage. In addition, when you deal Cold damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Lightning
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Lightning damage. In addition, when you deal Lightning damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Fire
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Fire damage. In addition, when you deal Fire damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Thunder
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Thunder damage. In addition, when you deal Thunder damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

options.name: Great Weapon Master
options.description:
Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack|w=30
:* When an attack with a melee weapon lands a Critical Hit or kills a creature, you can make another melee weapon attack as a Bonus Action that turn.

Great Weapon Master: All In|w=30
:* When attacking with a Two-Handed or Versatile melee weapon (in both hands) that you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.
:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack
grants.description: When you land a Critical Hit or kill a target with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus that turn.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: All In
grants.description: When attacking with Heavy melee weapons you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.

options.name: Heavily Armoured
options.description:
Heavily Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with HeavyArmour.

grants.name: Heavily Armoured
grants.description:
You gain Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Medium Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Heavy Armour Master
options.description:
Heavy Armour Master|w=30
:* Increase your Strength by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

grants.name: Heavy Armour Master
grants.description:
Your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

Requires Proficiency with Heavy Armour

options.name: Lightly Armoured
options.description:
Lightly Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with LightArmour.

grants.name: Lightly Armoured
grants.description: You gain Armour Proficiency with Light Armour and your Strength and Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Bard
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Bard|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Bard
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Cleric
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Cleric|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Cleric spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Wisdom.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Cleric
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Cleric spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Wisdom.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Druid
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Druid|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Druid spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Wisdom.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Druid
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Druid spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Wisdom.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Sorcerer
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Sorcerer|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Sorcerer spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Sorcerer
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Sorcerer spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Warlock
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Warlock|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Warlock spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Warlock
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Warlock spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Wizard
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Wizard|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Wizard spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Intelligence.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Wizard
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Wizard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Intelligence.

options.name: Martial Adept
options.description:
Martial Adept|w=30
:* Learn two manoeuvres from the Short or Long Rest.

grants.name: Martial Adept
grants.description: Learn two manoeuvres from the Battle Master archetype and receive 1 (additional) supdie to fuel them. You regain expended Superiority Dice after a Short or Long Rest.

options.name: Medium Armour Master
options.description:
Medium Armour Master|w=30
:* When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to Armour Class you can gain from your Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

grants.name: Medium Armour Master
grants.description:
When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to ArmourClass you can gain from your Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

You must have Proficiency in Medium Armor to take this feat

options.name: Mobile
options.description:
* Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10.

Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain|w=30
:* When you use the Dash action, Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down.

Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke an Opportunity Attack from that target.

grants.name: Mobile
grants.description:
* Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10.

Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain|w=30
:* When you use the Dash action, Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down.

Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke an Opportunity Attack from that target.

options.name: Moderately Armoured
options.description:
Moderately Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with MediumArmour and Shields.

grants.name: Moderately Armoured
grants.description:
You gain Proficiency with Medium Armour and Shields, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Light Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Performer
options.description:
* Increase your Charisma by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Gain Musical Instrument Proficiency.

grants.name: Performer
grants.description:
* Increase your Charisma by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Gain Musical Instrument Proficiency.

options.name: Polearm Master
options.description:
Polearm Master: Bonus Attack|w=30
:* When attacking with a Glaive, Halberd, Quarterstaff, or Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
:* Note: This attack deals 1d4 + Weapon Ability Modifier damage.

Polearm Master: Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

grants.name: Polearm Master: Bonus Attack
grants.description:
When attacking with a Glaive, Halberd, Quarterstaff, or Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
This attack does 1d4|Bludgeoning|modifier=melee

grants.name: Polearm Master: Opportunity Attack
grants.description: You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

options.name: Resilient
options.description:
Resilient|w=30
:* You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency in that ability's SavingThrows.
:* Note: this increase does apply to a druid in wild shape.

grants.name: Resilient
grants.description:
You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Gain Proficiency in that ability's SavingThrow.

options.name: Ritual Caster
options.description:
Ritual Caster: Free Spells|w=30
:* You learn two Ritual_Spell_Icon|24px Ritual Spells of your choice.
:* Note: the spell must be one of these:
:** Enhance Leap
:** Disguise Self
:** Find Familiar
:** Longstrider
:** Speak with Animals
:** Speak with Dead

grants.name: Ritual Caster: Free Spells
grants.description:
You learn two Ritual_Spell_Icon|24px Ritual Spells of your choice from the following: 
* Speak with Dead
* Find Familiar
* Longstrider
* Enhance Leap
* Disguise Self
* Speak with Animals

options.name: Savage Attacker
options.description:
Savage Attacker|w=30
:* When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

grants.name: Savage Attacker
grants.description: When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

options.name: Sentinel
options.description:
Sentinel: Vengeance|w=30
:* When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

Sentinel: Snare|w=30
:* When you hit a creature with an Attack of Opportunity, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

grants.name: Sentinel: Vengeance
grants.description: When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

grants.name: Sentinel: Snare
grants.description: When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

grants.name: Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage
grants.description: You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

options.name: Sharpshooter
options.description:
Sharpshooter: Low Ground|w=30
:* Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

Sharpshooter: All In|w=30
:* Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.
:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Sharpshooter: Low Ground
grants.description: Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

grants.name: Sharpshooter: All In
grants.description:
Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.
(This is a toggleable passive effect)

options.name: Shield Master
options.description:
Shield Master|w=30
:* Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

Shield Master: Block|w=30
:* If a Spell forces you to make a Dexterity Saving Throw, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
:* Notes:
:** On a failed save, you only take half damage.
:** On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

grants.name: Shield Master
grants.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

grants.name: Shield Master: Block
grants.description:
If a Spell forces you to make a DEX, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
* On a failed save, you only take half damage.
* On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

options.name: Skilled
options.description:
Skilled|w=30
:* You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

grants.name: Skilled
grants.description: You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

options.name: Spell Sniper
options.description:
Spell Sniper|w=30
:* You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.
:* Notes:
:** The cantrip you learn must be one of these:
:*** Bone Chill
:*** Eldritch Blast
:*** Fire Bolt
:*** Ray of Frost
:*** Shocking Grasp
:*** Thorn Whip
:** These cantrips do scale with character level, just like a spellcaster's cantrips.

grants.name: Spell Sniper
grants.description:
You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

The cantrip must be one of:
* Bone Chill
* Eldritch Blast
* Fire Bolt
* Ray of Frost
* Shocking Grasp
* Thorn Whip

options.name: Tavern Brawler
options.description:
Tavern Brawler|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Constitution by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your strength modifier is added twice to the damage and Attack Rolls.Bug

grants.name: Tavern Brawler
grants.description:
Increase your Strength or Constitution by 1, to a maximum of 20.

When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your Strength Modifier is added twice to the damage and Attack Rolls.Bug

options.name: Tough
options.description:
Tough|w=30
:* Hit Point maximum increased by 2 for each level.

grants.name: Tough
grants.description: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 2 for every level you have gained.

options.name: War Caster
options.description:
War Caster: Concentration|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on SavingThrows to maintain Concentration on a Spell.

War Caster: Opportunity Spell|w=30
:* You can also use a Reaction to cast Shocking Grasp at a target moving out of melee range.
:* Note: this feat does not grant the cantrip Shocking Grasp. Unless you know it from another source, you can only  cast it as an Attack of Opportunity.

grants.name: War Caster: Concentration
grants.description: You gain Advantage on SavingThrows to maintain Concentration on a Spell.

grants.name: War Caster: Opportunity Spell
grants.description: You can also use a Reaction to cast Shocking Grasp at a target moving out of melee range.

options.name: Weapon Master
options.description:
Weapon Master|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with four Weapon types of your choice.
|}

options.name: Circle of the Land
options.description: Druids of this Circle connect to powerful magic that flows through the earth and binds all living things together.

grants.name: Nature's Ward
grants.description: You can't be Charmed or Frightened by elementals and fey. Disease and poison also no longer affect you.

options.name: Circle of the Moon
options.description: Druids sworn to the moon draw on its mercurial nature to transform into massive creatures and primal elementals.

action.name: Wild Shape: Air Myrmidon
action.summary: Wild Shape: Air Myrmidon is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moon.
action.description:
Take the shape of an Air Myrmidon who gains the ability to fly and to cast lightning spells. 

This shape consumes 2 Wild Shape charges, and comes equipped with a Flail of the Vortex that adds +1d8|Lightning to every attack.

action.name: Wild Shape: Earth Myrmidon
action.summary: Wild Shape: Earth Myrmidon is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moon.
action.description:
Take the shape of an Earth Myrmidon who gains the ability to fly and to cast earth spells.

This shape consumes 2 Wild Shape charges.

action.name: Wild Shape: Fire Myrmidon
action.summary: Wild Shape: Fire Myrmidon is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moons.
action.description:
Take the shape of a Fire Myrmidon who gains the ability to fly and to cast fire spells.

This shape consumes 2 Wild Shape charges, and comes equipped with a +3 Scimitar that adds +1d6|Fire to every attack.

action.name: Wild Shape: Water Myrmidon
action.summary: Wild Shape: Water Myrmidon is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moon.
action.description:
Take the shape of a Water Myrmidon who gains the ability to fly and to cast healing and cold spells.

This shape consumes 2 Wild Shape charges, and comes equipped with a +3 Trident that adds +1d6|Cold to every attack.

options.name: Circle of the Spores
options.description: Viewing death, necrosis, fungal growth, and sporulation as just another part of life, you can manipulate such spores to augment yourself and harm your foes.

action.name: Halo of Spores
action.summary: Halo of Spores is a Circle of the Spores Reaction. It releases spores that deal Necrotic damage to a nearby target.
action.description: Unleash a cloud of necrotic spores upon a target. This uses a reaction, so other reactions won't trigger this turn.

grants.name: Spreading Spores (Passive Feature)
grants.description: While Symbiotic Entity is active, you can create a cloud of Spreading Spores (Class Action)|Spreading Spores.
